title: What new technology will be put into 2021 automobiles? - Quora

response.answer_text: Last I heard they wanna have cars keeping theirselves in the middle of the lane. Let me put an educated guess on the name . Its gonna be called steering assitance . And the sensors in the front of the vehicle will have the capability to read all metals from iron in your blood to avoid casualties to led in the paint on the road . And there's gonna be this new module or computer that will convert the frequency of the self energizing magnetic sensors to actuate the abs and steering if not both. If the air pressure in your tire is off so would be traction control along with rest of that fancy stuff. Kinda makes you wonder why should you even have to buy a license if so.
